meanings.definition: The state or quality of being promiscuous.
meanings.sent1: Her promiscuities were well-known in the small town.
meanings.sent2: The promiscuities of the group shocked the conservative community.
meanings.sent3: Despite her promiscuities, she was a kind and caring person.
meanings.sent4: The promiscuities of nature can be seen in the diverse ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuities of the internet can sometimes lead to misinformation.

meanings.sent1: The promiscuities of his past relationships caused trust issues.
meanings.sent2: She regretted the promiscuities of her youth.
meanings.sent3: The promiscuities of the party scene were both exciting and dangerous.
meanings.sent4: In the promiscuities of the city, she found anonymity.
meanings.sent5: The promiscuities of the gossip mill spread like wildfire.
